snippet.title: Bob Gray, influential Washington lobbyist and founder of Gray & Co., dies at 92
snippet.description: To many observers of politics, Mr. Gray emobided lobbying as it came to be practiced in the modern era.

snippet.title: Saudi health minister sacked amid virus deaths
snippet.description: Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah sacked the country's health minister on Monday amid a spike in deaths and infections from the virus known as the Middle East respiratory syndrome, or MERS.

snippet.title: Juan Gabriel released from Las Vegas hospital
snippet.description: Mexican singer Juan Gabriel plans to resume his tour concerts May 1 after being released from a Las Vegas hospital.

snippet.title: As medical providers consolidate, questions about effects on costs, quality of care
snippet.description: A costly legal fight is pushing back against the merger mania gripping the U.S. medical system.

snippet.title: Notable deaths in the Washington area
snippet.description: Obituaries of residents from the District, Maryland and Northern Virginia.

snippet.title: Juan Gabriel expected to leave hospital soon
snippet.description: Mexican musical icon Juan Gabriel is expected to be released from a Las Vegas hospital this weekend after being admitted Monday with pneumonia.

snippet.title: Salsa great Cheo Feliciano dies in car crash at 78
snippet.description: Puerto Rican salsa legend Cheo Feliciano died in a car accident early Thursday, prompting the governor of the U.S. territory to declare three days of mourning.

snippet.title: The scary thing that nearly killed Fox Sports' Jay Glazer
snippet.description: NFL reporter is still recovering from aspiration double pneumonia he contracted during a routine surgical procedure.

snippet.title: Spate of Mideast virus infections raises concerns
snippet.description: A recent spate of infections from a frequently deadly Middle East virus is raising new worries about efforts to contain the illness, with infectious disease experts urging greater vigilance in combatting its spread.

snippet.title: Armando Peraza, world-recognized drummer, dies at 89
snippet.description: The Cuban-born musician performed with Carlos Santana for nearly two decades.
